title: Conor McGinn – 2021 Comments on ONS Crime Statistics
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Conor McGinn, the Shadow Security Minister, on 22 July 2021.
content:
Yet more rises in fraud under the Conservatives prove beyond doubt that they have lost control over this appalling crime.
